com.guardtime.ksi

Class SignerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.ksi.SignerBuilder

  • public final class SignerBuilder
extends Object
    Obtaining and configuring the Signer object(s). This class offers multiple methods to configure Signer object. It is mandatory to set the signing service client.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SignerBuilder() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Builds and returns the Signer instance.

      Sets the default signing hash algorithm to be used to create new KSI signatures.
      SignerBuilder setDefaultVerificationPolicy(ContextAwarePolicy policy)
      Sets the default verification policy.
      SignerBuilder setSigningService(KSISigningService signingService)
      Sets the signing service to be used in signing process.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SignerBuilder

        public SignerBuilder()

    • Method Detail

      • setDefaultSigningHashAlgorithm

        public SignerBuilder setDefaultSigningHashAlgorithm(HashAlgorithm defaultHashAlgorithm)
        Sets the default signing hash algorithm to be used to create new KSI signatures. When using Signer.sign(DataHash) or Signer.asyncSign(DataHash) method, this algorithm is ignored. By default HashAlgorithm.SHA2_256 algorithm is used.

      • setSigningService

        public SignerBuilder setSigningService(KSISigningService signingService)
        Sets the signing service to be used in signing process.

      • setDefaultVerificationPolicy

        public SignerBuilder setDefaultVerificationPolicy(ContextAwarePolicy policy)
        Sets the default verification policy. Verification will be ran before signature is returned to the user. If signature verification fails, InvalidSignatureContentException exception is thrown. If needed, user can access the invalid signature and verification result using the methods InvalidSignatureContentException.getSignature() and InvalidSignatureContentException.getVerificationResult().

        By default the policy returned by method ContextAwarePolicyAdapter.createInternalPolicy() is used.

      • build

        public Signer build()
        Builds and returns the Signer instance. If signing client isn't configured, NullPointerException is thrown.
